Content: We are looking for EU and US pc/consoleNLNL@everyone Server RulesNLNL~ Toxicity is not tolerated in this server_ any reports of toxicity report to a member of staff.NL~ We do not allow racism in this server_ use of the N word isnâ€™t allowed even if you are black.NL~ Do not make death jokes as it may offend some members.NL~ Do not joke about peoples families.NL~ Do not make jokes about life threatening illnesses as it may offend some.NL~ Do not impersonate people.NL~ Do not spam.NL~ Do not tag Administrators_ Senior Moderators or Moderators for no reason.NL~ Do not have an inappropriate or rude name_ it will be changed.NL~ Do not threaten to ddos (take down someones internet). An instant ban will be given.NL~ Do not disrespect staff in anyway_ staff do not have to explain themselves to you.NL~ Do not promote other servers here or in people direct messages.NL~ Use common sense!NL~ Do not try twisting the rules to get away with something.NLNLIf you do not follow these rules then action by staff will be taken_ and a punishment will be given.NLNLMembers_ if you spot anybody breaking these rules report it to a member of staff with photo proof for action to be taken.
